title: Company profile fails to save with special characters in name
description: When creating or editing a company profile with special characters (e.g., &, ®, ™) in the company name, the save operation fails with a 400 error. This prevents users from accurately recording company names that include these legal characters.

reproductionSteps.step: Navigate to the company creation form or edit an existing company
Enter a company name with special characters, e.g., 'Johnson & Johnson®'
reproductionSteps.expectedResult: Field accepts the input and displays it correctly
reproductionSteps.actualResult: Field accepts and displays the input correctly

reproductionSteps.step: Fill in other required fields (industry, size, website)
Click the 'Save' button to save the company profile
reproductionSteps.expectedResult: Company profile is saved successfully and user sees confirmation
reproductionSteps.actualResult: 400 Bad Request error appears: 'Invalid characters in company name'. Company is not saved.

rootCause: Backend API validation regex pattern does not allow certain special characters that are valid in company names. Frontend passes these characters but backend rejects them.
